I suspect we will see a return to subscription services. Not widespread - but significant.

IMO a rigorous "just the facts" news service could do well on the deepweb. Primarily because people are tired of being tracked then labeled by the information they consume. Ease the way for anonymous cash transactions and things will move.

Bitcoin is a hassle. Just let us buy "internet bucks" for cash from Kroger.
